item.description: Carlos Eduardo de Andrade is a principal inventive scientist at the Network Analytics and Automation department at AT&T Labs Research. He is a specialist in prescriptive analytics and operations research, working with large-scale combinatorial optimization problems using model-driven and custom approaches. Scheduling changes on hundreds of thousands of nodes in a highly heterogeneous network and optimizing parameters for other hundreds of thousands of 4G and 5G equipment is part of his daily job.
